name: Pestilence of Vassago
description:
Pestilence of Vassago

Created by Eric Pugliese

More an amazing proof of concept for a full role-playing experience, this prototype has an adorable little plague doctor battling hand-crafted enemies using a very well-balanced tactical turn-based strategy system powered by harvesting humors from your foes to fuel very creative attacks and restoratives.

Beautifully dark original graphics and style, Pestilence of Vassago is a solid study in how to design, execute, and balance a complex combat system that could be scaled to do amazing things in the future.
